title: Mixed Learning-Based Creative Problem-Solving (CPS) Course Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Problem-Solving Skills and Digital Device Utilization Skills
context.additional_context: Process focused on cultivating real-life problem-solving skills through CPS (Creative Problem Solving) training integrated with language curriculum

learning_goals: Learners can systematically solve language-related problems using the CPS 6-stage model (problem discovery, problem definition, idea generation, idea evaluation, solution development, acceptance planning).
Learners can apply creative thinking skills in a blended learning environment combining digital tools (pads/tablets) and paper-based activities.
Learners can enhance critical thinking by refining solutions through peer feedback processes.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
